Dust emissions in CESM are calculated by the CLM. We used CLM version 4.0, extended with a carbon–nitrogen biogeochemical model (CLM4-CN)
24 . To calculate dust emissions, the three BASE simulations (Table 1) used CLM’s default dust flux parameterization
8, 19 , which uses a preferential dust source function
51 to calculate the total dust emissions.
